channel.title: Client help
channel.description: Can someone give me a good tutorial on how to get a client with my ip (im running hamachi servers) and how to send it to my friends and advertise my server. This is my 1st time running a client. i usually use a 317 ip changer but it cant load d claws or anything worth using. so i need a tutorial on how to get my ip on a client and send to friends and advertise on hamachi server.

item.title: Client help
item.dc:creator: @Butchd12 Butchd12
item.description:
@Butchd12 wrote:

tann:

Can someone give me a good tutorial on how to get a client with my ip (im running hamachi servers) and how to send it to my friends and advertise my server. This is my 1st time running a client. i usually use a 317 ip changer but it cant load d claws or anything worth using. so i need a tutorial on how to get my ip on a client and send to friends and advertise on hamachi server.

no offence, but people wont want to play on a server that needs hamachi, think about it for a second…why would they want to download something to play it, when most has a webclient…speaking of that…do you have a webclient…probely not…sorry dude, my opinion is not to have a server up that runs of hamachi now a days…=( but best of luck to you

Read full topic

item.title: Client help
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

I don’t know a thing about Hamachi. Though, just download a client and I think Hamachi will provide some sort of main IP for members to connect to. Replace the original IP with the provided IP from Hamachi.

Read full topic

item.title: Client help
item.dc:creator: @tann tann
item.description:

lol? theirs websites strictly for advertising hamachi servers… their lots of them.
